review: lego star wars iii delivers fun humor and a solid variety of missions set in the clone wars universe the visuals are vibrant and the coop gameplay is great for casual fans and younger players  however the game suffers from repetitive levels clunky hub navigation and a bloated collectible system completing the game 100 becomes a tedious grind and the final reward is incredibly disappointing making the effort feel unrewarding
